text:
Hi folks,

I was just wondering if it's possible to set up any kind of notifications for when a HubSpot app webhook fails (returns status code 4xx or 5xx). This seems like a necessary feature so I would be shocked if there's not at least a HubSpot API endpoint related to it, but I've been looking for hours and haven't found even a mention of the topic on the forums, Google, anywhere.

Thanks!
